description: This tool initializes a transform between two images based on corresponding landmarks.

dimension.title: Dimension
dimension.description: The dimensionality of the registration problem (e.g., 2 for 2D, 3 for 3D).

fixed_image.title: Fixed Image
fixed_image.description: The fixed image in the registration process.

moving_image.title: Moving Image
moving_image.description: The moving image in the registration process.

transform_type.title: Transform Type
transform_type.description: The type of transform to initialize. Options are 'rigid', 'affine', or 'bspline'.

output_transform.title: Output Transform
output_transform.description: The output transform file that will be created.

mesh_size.title: Mesh Size
mesh_size.description: The mesh size for the B-spline transform, specified as 'meshSize[0]xmeshSize[1]x...'. Default is '1x1x1'.

number_of_levels.title: Number of Levels
number_of_levels.description: Number of levels for multi-resolution fitting. Default is 4.

order.title: Order
order.description: The polynomial order of the B-spline transform. Default is 3.

enforce_stationary_boundaries.title: Enforce Stationary Boundaries
enforce_stationary_boundaries.description: Enforces stationary boundaries for the B-spline transform. Default is 1 (true).

landmark_weights.title: Landmark Weights
landmark_weights.description: File containing landmark weights. Each row is either 'label,labelWeight' or 'labelWeight'.
